last_episode_to_air.overview: Ki Sub mustered the courage to honestly express his feelings to his family to clear up unresolved issues. In an attempt to cheer up the despondent Balg Eum, they both volunteer to help with a countdown party. In Ho, upon learning Balg Eum's true feelings, also visits the shop to give a final farewell...
last_episode_to_air.name: Promise of Love At First 'Sight'

name: Boys Be Brave!
overview: Jung Ki Sub is Kim Jin Woo's slacker friend - and secret crush. So, when Ki Sub asks to crash at his place, his heart tingles to be near him every day. But as the short stay turns into permanent mooch, how long can Jin Woo keep his true feelings under wraps and hold back from confessing?

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Jung Ki Sub is Kim Jin Woo's slacker friend - and secret crush. So when Ki Sub asks to crash at his place, his heart tingles to be near him everyday. But as the short stay turns into permanent mooch, how long can Jin Woo keep his true feelings under wraps and hold back from confessing?

episodes.name: I Can't Confess
episodes.overview: When the person he has a crush on suddenly moves into his house, Jin Woo tells his new roommate to move out by 10PM.

episodes.name: Finding Your Ideal Type
episodes.overview: After learning what Jin Woo's ideal type is, Ki Sub decides to reach his goal by the deadline.

episodes.name: The Contract That Started It All
episodes.overview: Jin Woo accepts the contract proposed by Ki Sub and begins living with him for a week, and is surprised by Ki Sub's success in meeting the criteria of his ideal type, which he thought was impossible. On the other hand, Balg Eum is shaken by the appearance of In Ho, whom he had feelings for in high school, and after thinking about it, he coldly pushes him away.

episodes.name: My Ideal Type and You Who Suddenly Appear Unexpectedly
episodes.overview: Jin Woo unexpectedly kisses Ki Sub. Frustrated that his first kiss didn't go well, he goes to the library to study and read romance books, when he meets Hye Jin, a woman who looks like her ideal type. Balg Eum succumbs to In Ho's enthusiasm and promises to go on only three dates with him, but...

episodes.name: Someone Who I Can Love
episodes.overview: During their date, Jin Woo, who couldn't stop thinking about Ki Sub, evades Ki Sub's question about his relationship with Hye Jin. Worried about Jin Woo, Ki Sub is confronted by Hye Jin, who tells him to disappear for Jin Woo's sake. Meanwhile, Balg Eum and In Ho spend time alone at home.

episodes.name: Knowing One's Heart, Singing Words of Love
episodes.overview: After leaving Jin Woo's house, Ki Sub feels unwell and goes to the elementary school where his sister works. When Ki Sub finally realizes his feelings and goes to Jin Woo's house, Jin Woo isn't there. Balg Eum, upset that the second date didn't go as planned, became emotional, and the feelings he had kept hidden burst out...

episodes.name: The Gift I've Always Wanted to Receive
episodes.overview: The two finally reunite. Clearing up their misunderstandings, they spend a pleasant night together at Jin Woo's family home. Learning about Jin Woo's childhood, Ki Sub decides to plan a surprise for him. The next day, deeply moved by the heartfelt surprise, Jin Woo finally makes up his mind...

episodes.name: Promise of Love At First 'Sight'
episodes.overview: Ki Sub mustered the courage to honestly express his feelings to his family to clear up unresolved issues. In an attempt to cheer up the despondent Balg Eum, they both volunteer to help with a countdown party. In Ho, upon learning Balg Eum's true feelings, also visits the shop to give a final farewell...
